guide_1: STEPN is a Web3-based application with social and game elements.
guide_2: Start walking, jogging, or running outdoors and earn tokens by spending Energy.
guide_3: In order to use the app, you must purchase an NFT Sneaker from the Marketplace.
guide_4: Deposit your $coin or USDC into your Wallet in order to fund your Spending account.
guide_5: The Spending account shows the tokens that can be spent in STEPN.
guide_6: Wallet shows tokens that you can deposit or withdraw to/from other addresses.
shoe_earn_speed: Move at $speed km/h to earn token!
keep_gem: 3% to keep a Gem if upgrade fails
keep_scroll: 2% to keep a Minting Scroll after minting
loss_gem_content: Subscribe to increase your chance to keep one Gem
membership_scroll: Keep a Minting Scroll after minting (2%)
membership_gem: Keep a Gem after unsuccessful upgrade (3%)
current_free: You are a proud community member but have not subscribed to the VIP Program.
current_vip: You are subscribed to the VIP Program.
membership_terms_1: Subscription will be charged to your iTunes account once you confirm, and at the start of each renewal term. Subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled via iTunes account settings at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. For more information, please see our
subscribe_email_toast: The VIP subscription is not under your account.
run_countdown_tips: Please keep your speed in the green zone to maximize your token earning.
Moonwalking neither deducts Energy nor generates tokens.
Looking at the scenery can help you reflect on life; looking at your mobile screen only reflects your face.
It takes hours to refill one's energy, but only minutes to spend it.
Upgrade the Sneaker to increase your Daily Earning Cap.
The more Sneakers you have, the more energy you get.
If you're lucky, you might find a Mystery Box after your walk, jog, or run.
Use the app in moderation, because the greatest wealth is health.

faq.a: Users can earn GST/GMT by walking, jogging, or running outdoors with an NFT Sneaker. Alternatively, users can choose to trade GST/GMT for other tokens through the in-app Swap function.
GSTs are minted daily by users through moving. These GSTs are then burned daily to upgrade, mint new NFT Sneakers, etc.
GMT is the Governance Token of STEPN, users can spend GMT to access in-app features.

faq.q: Do I need to transfer any SOL/BNB/ETH to use STEPN?
faq.a: Yes, this is a Web 3.0 mobile app built on Solana and BNBChain. Users need to pay a SOL/BNB/ETH as Gas Fee when transferring digital assets.
We use motion sensors, GPS, and machine learning to detect cheating. This is explained in our white paper.

faq.q: Why didn't I earn anything after walking or running with STEPN?

faq.a: Moonwalking occurs when you are not qualified for move2earn, which includes moving indoors, riding bikes, or driving cars, or have weak GPS signals.

Users can mint a new NFT Sneaker from two Level 5 Sneakers by burning GST/GMT. Each Sneaker can be minted up to 7 times; the higher the minting count, the higher the cost, but also higher the chance to receive a "twin".

faq.q: How can I refill my energy?
faq.a: Your energy refills automatically at a rate of 25% every 6 hours.

faq.q: If my NFT Sneaker's Durability is 51/100, can I still run on it until it reaches 0?
faq.a: Durability is a measure of how quickly an NFT Sneaker wears out. When the Sneaker Durability drops below 50% and 20%, the Sneaker receives a "worn-out" penalty, which reduces the Sneaker's Efficiency to 90% and 10% of its full value respectively.

spendingHelp.a: Users need SOL in this account to make any purchases on the Marketplace. Show past 30 days' transactions.

bscspending.a: Users need BNB in this account to make any purchases on the Marketplace. Show past 30 days transactions.

ethspending.a: Users need ETH in this account to make any purchases on the Marketplace. Show past 30 days transactions.

walletHelp.a: Users can use the Receive and Transfer function to transfer funds in and out of STEPN, or use the trade function to Swap GST/GMT to or from SOL/USDC

bscwallet.a: Users can use the Receive and Transfer function to transfer funds in and out of STEPN, or use the trade function to Swap GST/GMT to or from BNB/USDC

ethwallet.a: Users can use the Receive and Transfer function to transfer funds in and out of STEPN, or use the trade function to Swap GST/GMT to or from ETH/USDC

run.t1: Congratulations on your first step towards a healthier lifestyle!
run.t2: To earn tokens, make sure you are running outdoors and have your GPS turned on!
run.t3: There are two caps that affect your daily earning: the token cap (yellow) and energy cap (blue). Level up or hold more Sneakers to increase the cap respectively.
run.t4: The token cap resets every 24 hours, and energy cap refills 25% every 6 hours.
run.t5: You can keep track of your earnings and energy consumption while running, but keep in mind to stay safe.
run.t6: Move in between the optimal speed interval to maximize your token earning potential.

levelup.t2: Upgrade your Sneakers to improve your attributes!

addPoint.t1: Increase your Token earnings by improving your attributes!

repair.t2: When a Sneaker's durability drops below 50%, the token earning efficiency drops to 90%; if durability drops below 20%, efficiency drops to 10%

mint.t2: You are eligible for Shoe-minting! (You have 2 Sneakers over level 5.)!

socketOpen.t2: Your Sneaker has reached Level 5, a new Gem socket is unlocked, you can fit a matching color Gem in it.
socketOpen.t5: Tap to unlock the Gem socket and insert your Gem!

activationCode.t1: You have $count activation codes. Share them with your friends and family!
activationCode.t2: Invite friends and family to join STEPN with this code:
activationCode.t3: You get a new code every time you spend 10 Energies. You can only have one code at a time.

switchChain.t2: Tap and hold to change the blockchain you are using.
switchChain.t3: Tap to select the blockchain you want to switch to.

buyBNB.t2: You can register a Binance account and buy Tokens through the quick access link.

403: The network is busy, please try again later

deleteaccount.t1: Are you sure you want to delete your account:
deleteaccount.t3: ? Your account will be permanently deleted, and we will NOT be able to recover it. This will result the total loss of ALL your assets and data.

switch_chain_on_run: You cannot change the blockchain in the middle of running.
statement_activation_code: We are working hard to make STEPN ready for everybody. We are carefully building up our community ecosystem and we want to make sure it is done responsibly. For these reasons, an activation code is required to enter the game.

mint.t1: Minting requires 2 Minting Scrolls and 2 Vintage Sneakers. The Minting Scrolls need to match the Vintage Sneakers' quality. Minting Scrolls are permanently burned after use.
